HI, IM TAKUNDA

I’m a 2020 Economics graduate with a passion for web development. I’ve build this site to showcase my projects and help you get to know a little more about me. Hope you enjoy!

ABOUT ME

Below you will find out a little bit about me, my web development skillset and my personal goals in the the field of tech.

  • About
  • Skills
  • Goals

About

I started exploring web development after graduating with an economics degree from Nottnigham trent university in 2020. It started off, simply, as a desire to pick up a new skill during lockdown but i ended up falling in love with it. Since then i have been learning and building whilst working as a full time admin role.

In addition to coding I love to make music, play basketball, and watch Harry Potter films. I also love exploring self development and mental mastery content. Through my journey learning to code, mindset and perception has been everyhting when it comes to handling failure, and learning from my mistakes. Discovering new perspectives to look at life with, unlock new opportunities and allow us all to create positive outcomes from negative circumstances.

Skills

  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • Javascript
  • Wordpress
  • Basic understanding of SASS
  • Basic understanding of Git

In addition to these skills i am currently learning how to work with REACT.
